LanguageData.VREA_ExtractNeutroamineDesc: Extract 20 neutroamine from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VREA.CannotSetNotLivingCreature: Cannot set: not a living creature
LanguageData.VREA.NoNeutroCasket: No reachable, un-reserved non-prisoner neutrocasket in safe temperature.
LanguageData.VREA.ComponentWillBeRandomChosen: For each individual, one of the following components will be randomly selected to be active
LanguageData.VREA.ComponentLeftmostActive: Of the following components, the left-most one will always apply and the others are suppressed
LanguageData.VREA.MessageConflictingComponentPresent: Cannot save android with multiple conflicting components.
LanguageData.VREA.ComplexityDesc: How much complexity this adds to the process android creation.
LanguageData.VREA.PowerEfficiencyDesc: The power efficiency of this component. High efficiency means an android's reactor lasts a longer time. Low efficiency means the reactor will last less time.
LanguageData.VREA.ComplexityTotalDesc: The total complexity of all the hardware and subroutines in use.
LanguageData.VREA.PowerEfficiencyTotalDesc: The total power efficiency of all subroutines and hardware. High efficiency means an android's reactor lasts a longer time. Low efficiency means the reactor will last less time.
LanguageData.VREA.MessageCannotSelfTendEver: {1_labelShort} is incapable of doing Crafting work, and so cannot ever self-tend.
LanguageData.VREA.MessageSelfTendUnsatisfied: To self-tend, {1_labelShort} must also be assigned to Crafting work.
LanguageData.VREA.MoreInfoInInfoScreen: More information is available on this android's information screen.
LanguageData.VREA.HardwareComponentsDesc: Hardware are special components within the android that allow this particular unit to function. They normally cannot be removed, as they essentially are an android. In a rare situation when an android awakens, some hardware components might change or even be outright removed.
LanguageData.VREA.SubroutinesDesc: Subroutine components dictate how the android will behave and what knowledge it has. They can be changed via behaviorist station.
LanguageData.VREA.MessageSubcorePolyanalyzerCompleted: Subcore polyanalyzer completed for {PAWN_nameDef}. Scan progres: {1}
LanguageData.VREA.SubcorePolyanalyzerStartDesc: Once the {0} is filled with the required ingredients, {1}, select a colonist and right-click on the {0} or on a downed person to start the subcore polyanalyzer.
LanguageData.VREA.CancelAndroidDesc: Cancel the creation of this android and refund resources.
LanguageData.VREA.CreateAndroidDesc: Create a new android by selecting hardware and subroutines.
LanguageData.VREA.CreateAndroidAlreadyAssembling: Create android: already assembling an android
LanguageData.VREA.ResourceCostDesc: The resource cost to create this android. Androids require a persona subcore, which can be created in a subcore polyanalyzer.
LanguageData.VREA.UniqueAndroidDesc: A unique android variant with a set of hardware and subroutines that do not fall into any known androidtype.
LanguageData.VREA.CancelModifyingAndroidDesc: Cancel the process of modifying an android.
LanguageData.VREA.EfficiencyTooLowToCreateAndroid: The total power efficiency of the selected components must be {MIN} or higher to continue, but currently it is only {AMOUNT}.
LanguageData.VREA.AndroidAwakeningLowMood: {PAWN_nameDef} broke away from {PAWN_possessive} programming due to an extremely low mood. {PAWN_pronoun} developed thoughts and behaviors that deviate from {PAWN_possessive} intended function. {PAWN_pronoun} started recognizing {PAWN_objective}self as a being with consciousness and personhood. {PAWN_pronoun} will now refuse behavioral adjustments and will start recognizing {PAWN_possessive} mood as more than just part of {PAWN_possessive} programming. {PAWN_pronoun} can now learn skills by {PAWN_objective}self. {PAWN_pronoun} will also be able to go on mental breakdowns if {PAWN_possessive} mood is too low - just like humans do. As the awakening happened due to low mood, {PAWN_nameDef} has lashed out into a berserk mental break and will attack anyone that comes close.
LanguageData.VREA.AndroidAwakeningHighMood: {PAWN_nameDef} broke away from {PAWN_possessive} programming due to extreme happiness. {PAWN_pronoun} developed thoughts and behaviors that deviate from {PAWN_possessive} intended function. {PAWN_pronoun} started recognizing {PAWN_objective}self as a being with consciousness and personhood. {PAWN_pronoun} will now refuse behavioral adjustments and will start recognizing {PAWN_possessive} mood as more than just part of {PAWN_possessive} programming. {PAWN_pronoun} can now learn skills by {PAWN_objective}self. {PAWN_pronoun} will also be able to go on mental breakdowns if {PAWN_possessive} mood is too low - just like humans do. As the awakening happened due to high mood, {PAWN_nameDef} has gained an inspiration.
LanguageData.VREA.IsAndroidStat: Android with mechanoid labor: enhanced precept
LanguageData.VREA.ColdEfficiencyBonusStatExplanation: Cold efficiency subroutine: multiplier for temperature {0}
LanguageData.VREA.ComponentsDesc: The components associated with this androidtype.
